cultivation_arrays.description: Arrays are structured spiritual formations used to modify environmental effects in cultivation, defense, or trials.

Cultivation Array.purpose: Enhances soul force absorption or technique comprehension during meditation.

Formation Array (School).purpose: Used to test student knowledge of array logic, positioning, and spiritual diagramming.

Defensive Array (City).purpose: Protects cities from beast tides, assassins, or invaders.
Defensive Array (City).integration: May be enhanced by City Lord decree or pillar clan support
